left-panel.pageSummary: There can be no thought of finishing for ‘aiming for the stars.’ Both figuratively and literally, it is a task to occupy the generations. And no matter how much progress one makes, there is always the thrill of just beginning.

subsection-header.headline: headline
subsection-header.summary: A design language is a form of communication that, like any other, facilitates conveyance of an intended message to an audience. Any effective communication, verbal or visual, is made up of the same building blocks: context, delivery, and expression.

section-content.summary: A design language is a form of communication that, like any other, facilitates conveyance of an intended message to an audience. Any effective communication, verbal or visual, is made up of the same building blocks: context, delivery, and expression.
